column5: MERRY CHRISTMAS TO EVERYONE !!!! i hope santa is good to you & your freinds & family !!!!
Merry Christmas. But I'm wanting today to be over and Boxing day to start. $200 gift card for bass pro shop. Now I'm pumped.
Well wishes for the New Year gang.  My your lines be tight and your fish be monsters.
Merry Christmas and a Happy and Safe 2009 to everyone!
Well said Dawg.    Hope you all had a great day.
....Merry Christmas everyone. I hope you all have a wonderful day in the company of family and friends. Be well, be safe.
same to you and everyone else on board
Hope Santa was good to ya! Cheers, Dan
Merry Christmas to the entire OFC community.
Merry  Christmas every one have a great day
Merry Xmas to all.  Heading over to my sisters to have xmas with the whole family.  Pam
the best of the holidays to all. merry xmas.
Yes, wishing all a Merry Christmas... Enjoy...
Merry Christmas to all y'all!!!  Be sure to eat too much and don't drink and drive!!!
Yes Merry Christmas to all here at OFC Cheers
Merry Christmas everyone

Stuffing the bird RIGHT NOW. Well the boss is anyway. I'm TRAINING in preparation for the feast later. Son just woke up and my daughter just called to say they are on the way.  Merry Christmas all. Enjoy the season and your friends and family.  Steve
Merry Christmas to everyone at OFC!!
merry christmas everyone hope you all got some new fishing gear..
HoHoHo.....WFN has the christmas aquarium on the go!
merry christmas to all OFC!!!  Cheers!
Merry Christmas to you and yours also Chris, and to everyone here at OFC  Be safe and happy!!!  Joey, Tybo, Alan and Felix
Right back at ya Chris and the rest of the OFNers.Give my dog an extra treat today. Joe
Merry Christmas everyone!!...Hope you all have a great day with your loved ones and safe travels for those that will be on the roads..
Merry Christmas all
Merry Christmas Chris !!! Hope you have a great day with the extended family !
Thanks Spiel...and Merry Christmas to you and everyone here on OFC!  Heading to mom's later for turkey dinner...mmmm.....  Hope everyone has a great day today!
Best wishes for the holiday season to you Spiel and to the OFC gang
Mrry Christmas to all.   Hope everyone got what they wanted so there is no excuses fo not catching fish this year.....  lol  lol   Cheers!,  Jim
Merry Christmas everyone!
